abstracts.cdata!:
This program document presents a First
            Poverty Reduction Support Grant and Credit for to the
            Kingdom of Lesotho. This is the first in a series of three
            annual development policy operations (DPO) to assist the
            Government's reform program in support of
            Lesotho's Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy (PRGS).
            The PRSC-I will support Government reform efforts in the
            following three areas: (i) achieving broad-based growth by
            improving the business environment and improving the quality
            of information for decisionmaking; (ii) enhancing the
            effectiveness of public expenditures by strengthening the
            links between the PRGS and the macroeconomic and budget
            framework, and strengthening public finance management; and
            (iii) improving access and quality of basic services through
            effective implementation of sectoral programs and
            empowerment of communities at all levels of Government. In
            parallel, Bank support directly enhancing Lesotho's
            growth potential is being addressed through on-going IDA
            investment projects in infrastructure (transport and water)
            and private sector development.
